    • add

      public java.lang.String add​(SuppliesCrudService.SupplyDto dto) throws BusinessException
      Description copied from interface: SuppliesCrudService
      Registers a new supply in the system for the indicated provider and spare part
      Specified by:
      add in interface SuppliesCrudService
      Returns:
      the id of the new registered supply
      Throws:
      BusinessException - in case of: - there already exist a supply for the provider and the spare part - the delivery term or the price are negative - does not exist the provider - does not exist the spare part

    • delete

      public void delete​(java.lang.String nif, java.lang.String code) throws BusinessException
      Description copied from interface: SuppliesCrudService
      Removes from the system the supply uniquely indicated by the nif and code (a supply can be removed with no other considerations)
      Specified by:
      delete in interface SuppliesCrudService
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if the indicated supply does not exist

    • update

      public void update​(SuppliesCrudService.SupplyDto dto) throws BusinessException
      Description copied from interface: SuppliesCrudService
      Updates the supply with the new data from the incoming dto
      Specified by:
      update in interface SuppliesCrudService
      Throws:
      BusinessException - in case of: - it does not exist a supply for the provider and the spare part - the delivery term or the price are negative - the version field of the incoming dto does not match the version of the persistent entity
